mapper.select: SELECT num, replace(title,#{searchValue},'${searchValue}') title,writer, title,replace(writer,#{searchValue},'${searchValue}') writer, title,writer, title,writer, title,writer, content, hit, reip, bdate, imgn, vidn, cnt FROM (SELECT num, title, writer, content, hit, reip, bdate, imgn, vidn, (select count(*) from board_comm where board.num = board_comm.cnum) AS cnt, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY num desc) AS row_num from board title like '%'|| #{searchValue} ||'%' writer like '%'|| #{searchValue} ||'%' content like '%'|| #{searchValue} ||'%' ) numbered_rows WHERE row_num BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

select count(*) cnt from board
title like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
writer like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
content like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, imgn=#{imgn}, vidn=#{vidn}
